body:
### Steps to reproduce

unittests (2.7, clingo) job is failing in CI pipeline after being triggered by a PR. Here are two examples: PR #28826 and PR #28825. Currently it is not clear was is causing this.

### Error message



Spack v0.17.1 - python@2.7 +ucs4

[PASS] Core Functionalities

[PASS] Binary packages

[PASS] Optional Features

[FAIL] Development Dependencies
  [B] MISSING "isort": required for style checks
  [B] MISSING "mypy": required for style checks
  [B] MISSING "flake8": required for style checks
  [B] MISSING "black": required for code formatting


Spack will take care of bootstrapping any missing dependency marked as [B]. Dependencies marked as [-] are instead required to be found on the system.

ONLY PACKAGE RECIPES CHANGED [skipping slow unit tests]
==> Error: cannot import name _tracing
Error: Process completed with exit code 3.

### Information on your system

This is happening in a `github action` runner

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: unittests (2.7, clingo)) job of a CI pipeline is failing after being triggered by a git-push
